item.title: By: Hjortur Scheving
item.dc:creator: Hjortur Scheving
item.description: Just wanted to let people know this is a responsive design so it changes according to the device and screen resolution you have. This one looks best on a big screen, then you get the most details.
item.content:encoded: Just wanted to let people know this is a responsive design so it changes according to the device and screen resolution you have. This one looks best on a big screen, then you get the most details.
